--- layout: example.html title: Vector Label Decluttering shortdesc: Label decluttering with a custom renderer. resources: - https://cdn.polyfill.io/v2/polyfill.min.js?features=Set" docs: > Decluttering is used to avoid overlapping labels with `overflow: true` set on the text style. For MultiPolygon geometries, only the widest polygon is selected in a custom `geometry` function. tags: "vector, decluttering, labels" ---
